section.section: With the written approval of the State Archivist, a public official may destroy the record that the public official offers under this section, but the Archives declines to accept.

After records are destroyed, the public official shall send to the Archives:
a list of the records that were destroyed; and
a certificate of destruction.
The State Archivist shall keep each list of the records destroyed under this subsection. The list shall be available for public inspection at reasonable times.
